author: Phil Helsel
title: Flag on the play: Brady works out at park closed because of coronavirus
description: The city tweeted it is excited to welcome back the new Tampa Bay Buccaneer QB when the park is open, but "until then, stay safe and stay home as much as you can."
content:
Tom Brady has been working out but outside in a Florida park that's off-limits because of the coronavirus epidemic.
The person who spotted the Tampa Bay Buccaneers' new quarterback in the Tampa park wasn't there for an autograph, she was a city worker tellin… [+1395 chars]
